Name: You're Fired! Revenge!
About the game: Office Destruction Simulation Game 'You're Fired! Revenge!' Fired from your job, you destroy the Office into a mess to get revenge. This game is a 2.5D side-scrolling action game where all you have to do is to destroy the Office. Recommended ONLY if you want to break Office and refresh yourself. If you love your office, we do not recommend you to buy this. Enjoy destroying it, save your coins, and get yourself new weapons! There are 9 weapons in total. Broom Pipe Pan Bat Katana Hammer Pistol Assault Rifle Shotgun
